website_summaries.verdict: A great cod liver oil option if you're looking for the benefits of cod liver oil without any additives.
pros: One teaspoon of this oil has more than 1,000 milligrams of omega-3 fatty acids from wild-caught, sustainable sourced cod
The orange flavor is pleasant with no fishy aftertaste
cons: A little pricey when compared to other brands

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't anybody review the benefits of this product? It appears as though the majority of reviewers only write about the taste. This is incredibly aggravating! I've taken this for months, every morning before breakfast. I can't remember the last time I've been sick and have found brain fog gone. I workout 5 days a week, which includes a run for 20 minutes, circuit training for 30 minutes and have conquered 20 minutes of battle ropes adding this into my workout routine. My research regarding what supplements pro athletes take, typically includes fish oil. I don't care what the taste is like as long as I will reap healthy benefits. BTW, I'm a 60 year old women.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Two very important selling points.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time EVER trying cod liver oil. After reading endless amounts of reviews I settled on this brand, Nordic Naturals. Selling point #1: Contains non-synthetic vitamins. Selling point #2: Has a tangy scent/flavor and goes down easy. Stiffness of my joints (hands) is starting to slowly diminish with every passing day. Full disclosure: I’ve been taking 1tsp in the am and 1tsp before bedtime. I’m extremely deficient in both vitamins A & D due to a pre-existing condition, so, this dosage works specifically for MY condition/symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxx

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I work a swing shift which can be really hard on your brain and body. Someone recommended I start taking fish oil so I started with this. Not too long after beginning this regimen, I realized I was dreaming again (I hadn't realized I'd stopped). I feel much more refreshed and energized throughout the day because I'm sleeping better, not more, just better. I'm not yawning all the time at work and I feel much more awake and less fuzzy brained. I will continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Korrie H.

customer_reviews.title: anti-inflammatory like nothing else
customer_reviews.text: This is the most helpful supplement for my autoimmune arthritis. I take a tablespoon each day and as long as I don't eat any of the foods that cause me to react, I'm pain-free. I never thought that would be possible.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: I will ALWAYS reorder for my son!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this cod liver oil to my 3 yr old son over 6 months ago, and I swear by it! Since he was younger, he was constantly sick at least once a month! Now after taking this, he has not gotten sick! It has helped build his immunity. Before that, I was searching for the kids gummy, but they had too much sugar and he didn't care for it. When he first started taking this oil, he did not like taking it, but now he downs it like a champ with no fuss! Persistence! I highly recommend this for parents because it has worked so wonderfully for my child!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Way better than drugs for staying healthy
customer_reviews.text: Arctic cod liver oil was recommended by On Target Living. I have to say...it really does have a pleasant taste and my husband and I definitely feel better....at 66 and 72, to have no medical issues, and no need for medication....I’d say this stuff is a pretty good addition to our staying healthy plan!!
customer_reviews.author: Mort65

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for well over a year and have appreciated the quality and health benefits.....until my latest bottle. It has no taste, is watered down and a big let down. I called the manufacturer but need to go back through Amazon to hopefully rectify the problem.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: It has reduced my overall inflammation better than all the products I have tried to date.
customer_reviews.text: This is a magical heath potion, everyone should be taking this product. Also, I am sensitive to many, many foods. This is helping my digestion even though I purchased it for my arthritis joint pain and inflammation. Wowzers! If you are on the fence about this product .... just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is one of only two brands of cod liver oil recommended by the Magnesium Advocacy Group (be sure to get the version without added vitamin D) and it is by far the better tasting of the two. I've only tried the orange flavor but other group members really like the lemon. Very pleasant flavor; easy to take!
customer_reviews.author: ljppkgfgsc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for my kids but I started using this cause I read in the reviews that it clears up acne. I really didn't see the connection but I tried it and it works! I take a tablespoon every morning and the acne has definitely pretty much gone away. I get the occasional pimple but nothing crazy. If I run out, the acne usually starts coming back after a few days if not drinking this. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M

customer_reviews.title: Boosts Immune System
customer_reviews.text: I have Hashimoto’s and absorption issues so I wanted a good quality fish oil in hopes to boost my immune system this winter. I didn’t notice much of a difference while I was taking this but within a week after I ran out of my first bottle I ended up with a sinus infection/head cold. I just put in my order for a second bottle. This product truly has helped keep me from getting sick and I have noticed a significant difference in my energy levels while I was not taking it. I’m very groggy and tired. I will absolutely continue to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Fleming

customer_reviews.title: My good cholesterol is up and have had good medical and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my fifth bottle. My good cholesterol is up and have had good medical and eye doctor exams where they asked what form of fish oil I have been using as test results and general health is improving.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bauch

customer_reviews.title: It DOES help pain
customer_reviews.text: Cod liver oil has taken away my arthritis pain! The peach flavor is awful but the orange is very tolerable. Hold your nose and chase it with something but DO IT if you have pain, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Wills

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product for ourselves and our baby. There is ZERO fish taste. However I will say, don't get it on your clothing and if you do, wash it straight away. We were rubbing it on our babe during winter months and then putting an outfit on her and now they all smell like fish. I learned my lesson and devoted one outfit to "fish oil days" and then tossed it at the end because I couldn't get the smell out. She never smelled like fish about being rubbed down, though!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Artificial flavor/coloring and rancid taste
customer_reviews.text: Artificial flavor/coloring and rancid taste. There are better brands that provide the true essence of fish oil and come in a cooler case/ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: JeanB.

customer_reviews.title: Has a clean taste that actually makes you want to take it
customer_reviews.text: Well well, I was a bit hesitant because it cost more, however, I didn't want any added Vitamin A & D or anything else so this fit the bill. By default I got orange since the unflavored and lemon wasn't available it the larger bottle. I must say I am pleasantly surprised at how clean and pleasant this taste. No fishy taste, a suble flavor of orange. This is something I can taste with out even thinking about just swallowing. The reviews on there were spot on. I've never had a fish oil that taste this clean and nice. Try it, you won't go back to any other brand. At least I won't
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted true cod liver oil for its mineral and vitamin content as well as to beneficially influence my good to bad cholesterol ratio. After much research I chose this brand and am glad that I did. Time will tell if my regimen including Nordic Naturals Artic Cod Liver Oil proves to be beneficial to me and can be verified with lipid testing. I have confidence in this product to supply me with ALL the factors that real cod liver oil is known for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fredericks

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea was not in the description
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is easy on the palette. However, after only two doses, I have diarrhea. I took Saturday and Sunday only. Its now Friday and I'm still suffering to the point of messing my britches. Almost no time to get to toilet once it rumbles. Contacted company, and basically said its something else causing it or I'm taking to much. Dose on bottle is what I took. I'm not taking half and hope to still get it 1000 mg therapeutic properties. Returning. I offered to mom and it made her sick to her tummy. So buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed, doesn’t accept returns.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived today. When I unpacked it, the plastic safety seal was already torn apart on the bottle. The cap unscrewed easily, and there is no other seal inside the cap. I do not feel safe using this product. Went to return, notified that returns not accepted. Update: Was able to get a call in to Amazon Customer Service. They were very gracious, and rectified the situation. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Actually quite tasty.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this for about 2 years. While it sounds disgusting, I don’t get any fish burps from it and drink 1/2 tablespoon daily, mixed in an ounce of water and 1 tablespoon of apple cider vinegar and a fresh squeezed lemon. The flavor of this fish oil is tasty and it has helped bring up my good cholesterol. I have low cholesterol in general, but my dr wants to see my good get up a bit higher.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: This is the best quality fish oil on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality fish oil on the market. I have been giving this to my daughter for many years. When I started to take it my cholesterol and triglycerides improved significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Tamper-evident seal missing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The bottle came with the tamper-evident seal missing!
customer_reviews.author: Andresa Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: Thank You! Very Fast Shipping too!
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm already feeling better.! I also like the cobalt blue bottle. I've done my homework and this CLO is certified and consistent quality to the GMP guidelines. I also like the fact that the Norwegian people don't OVER FISH their beautiful lakes and rivers and maintain the abundant fish population levels in their pristine waterways. I am grateful Thank You Team @ Nordic Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: Gogreen87

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been able to drink cod liver or even take the capsules because I can't stand the aftertaste and repeated reminder throughout the day... This was strangely not so bad. It doesn't even really taste like cod liver oil but definitely works the same. Pleasantly surprised and looking forward to purchasing more which in itself is really strange LOL. I mean it is cod liver oil in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion!

customer_reviews.title: Where's the D?
customer_reviews.text: ??? I bought cod liver oil because it's supposed to be packed with bioavailable Vitamin D. Uh... this product appears to have only negligible amounts of D. Where did the D go?!?! Processed out??? For heaven's sake, WHY? I'll keep taking it for the Omega 3's, and probably end up using it mostly as a topical. Won't but it again because NO D.
customer_reviews.author: MightyMaeve

customer_reviews.title: Omega 3 ratios
customer_reviews.text: The oil was easy to take orally and did not produce digestive problems. The taste was pleasant and it's epa dha ratios were excellent for a product in this price range. The literature on omega 3s discusses increasing benefits in general nerve health.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Sort of fishy tasting....
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who tells you there is no fishy taste is full of beans. Now, it's not terrible by no means. It's more of an after taste, especially if you get it on you lips. The bottle itself also smells fishy. But what do u expect, it's fish oil. That being said, if you mix with OJ and be careful about not getting it on your lips when downing it, I'd say most would be ok with it. Now, I gotta run and rinse out my mouth since I wasn't careful the first time. ;)
customer_reviews.author: B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the cod liver oil for about a week now. The taste is not fishy and it has a little oily mouth feel but not bad at all. I think I'm starting to feel a difference already!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miether

customer_reviews.title: Great for Immunity
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with this product. I give it to my daughters as well, and for the first time they have not been sick all winter. They are 3 and 5, and we are normally sick with one thing after another all winter. Very happy with the immune system benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Alca Cowi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, no fishy smell!
customer_reviews.text: This CLO has been one of the top brands recommended on health groups. It doesn’t even taste/ smell like fish oil compare to another brand I have used, very nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Lana K

customer_reviews.title: best there is
customer_reviews.text: nordic naturals cod liver oil is the best there is. The real thing. I take 1/2 teaspoon this + 1/2 teaspoon blue ice skate liver oil + pure encapsulations 10k vit A from fish oil + PE 5k vit D 5K and my skin is SILKY
customer_reviews.author: Meggie Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great, trust worthy product.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my LO (15 months) takes this daily. Good taste and easy to swallow. LO doesn't complain either. We haven't been taking it for long so I can't give details on the benefits yet.
customer_reviews.author: amberreadsrommance

customer_reviews.title: Mild orange flavor without fishy aftertaste.
customer_reviews.text: I take this to strengthen my immune system as part of Root Cause Protocol. It has a mild orange flavor without a strong fish taste. I find it has also improved my vision. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cod liver oil! I was hesitant to try it in liquid form but my naturopath said liquid was best and in a glass bottle. The taste is much better than I ever hoped for. Thank you Nordic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by a friend to raise our HDL
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a friend to raise our HDL. He said it helped raise his level. The product has a nice orange flavor, so thankful it doesn’t taste like fish.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly
customer_reviews.text: This did not do what it said that it was going to do. The price is very expensive and it should work better than it says that it does. I do not like this product and I was not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: hotty toddy rebel

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the product come promptly and safely packaged, but this is the best tasting Cod Liver Oil I have ever had. For health reasons, I used a different brand before. The other brand tasted so terrible, I was never going to use Cod Liver Oil again. A colleague suggested I try Nordic Naturals flavored Cod Liver Oil & he was not kidding. I'm back to my morning routine and will continue to share my extremely positive experience with friends, family and coworkers. I HIGHLY RECOMEND this product and this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for health.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice oil. Just little hard to drink but it’s good for health.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha  sarwar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not an amazing smell or taste on it's own but great is smoothies and shakes. It's definitely helped my husband and I be more alert. Would recommend having a couple tablespoons each day for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Get a subscription on this
customer_reviews.text: I've taken for 120 days without fail. I have more energy, totally changed the texture of my skin, haven't broken out in months, and better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Luna Lima

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I got this to counter act tooth decay due to grains like oats in the diet. It also gives me peace of mind knowing my kids are getting some good nutrition at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly pleasant taste
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised to find that I can take this straight, no need to disguise. The taste is very pleasant, all I taste is a mild orange, no fish taste at all. I got this because it was the only cod liver oil I could find that didn’t have retinyl palmitate added which I can’t take.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This does actually taste like fish (I was a fool to believe the reviewers who said it didn’t). However, it is not offensive or overpowering and the citrus is a light, smart touch. This seems like a great product.
customer_reviews.author: eht

customer_reviews.title: Great product but overpriced for me at least
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product but it is too pricey for my liking I will not be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: GLOCKIOMM

customer_reviews.title: Hard to stomach
customer_reviews.text: We really can’t stomach this. I appreciate the quality of the product but will have to buy it in capsule form.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A

customer_reviews.title: Came without a seal, as if it was opened.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it 2 stars because the product came with absolutely no seal. And it states on the bottle, do not use if seal is missing. It came in a condition that looks like it’s been opened and used already. For $40 for a bottle, that’s unacceptable in my book.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Seal was broken
customer_reviews.text: While the contents smell and taste like they should, the seal of the bottle was off. The instructions state not to use if tamper-evident seal is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE - NO SAFETY SEAL
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived WITHOUT a plastic seal on the outside of the lid - also zero internal seal on the bottle opening. The plastic cap was slightly unscrewed and a little cod oil spilled out on the packaging. The product says “no returns allowed” but I cannot give this to my child in the condition in which it arrived. PLEASE HELP
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good for so many things
customer_reviews.text: Cod liver oil is good for so many things. I take this because it is a good source of vitamin A. The taste is good. Even my 13year old takes it without much complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted. Omega 3 fats. This fits the bill, tastes good, (orange), and I don't need to eat a bunch of fish.
customer_reviews.author: Florence A. Ripka

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dry skin hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and the orange flavor is my favorite. It keeps my skin hydrated in the winter and has really helped with my dry eyes. I take a swig straight from the bottle everyday and chase it with oj.
customer_reviews.author: aladie

customer_reviews.title: We just ate $42.00
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken. Unable to replace online as Amazon said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ACO bottle had broken seal & lid was loose
customer_reviews.text: CLO bottle had broken seal & Lid was bit unscrewed
customer_reviews.author: mohammad malik

customer_reviews.title: Taste is really palatable. I give it to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste is really palatable. I give it to my dogs and take it myself as well. I noticed less fibromyalgia pain after I started taking this.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: I think it's better, but it's not miracle
customer_reviews.text: My kids tolerate the taste. We used a different type of fclo for a while and they complained about flavor that so we tried this. I think it's better, but it's not miracle. That said, the benefits are worth the whining from the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a regular basis. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joanetta Hendel

customer_reviews.title: Good favor, easy to take, loads of omega 3
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to convince myself to take fish oil thanks to this easy and flavorful to take. All I had before this was these big giant pills that's so hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S

customer_reviews.title: I particularly like and trust the brand Nordic Naturals and I find ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is used as part of my supplemental regiment. I have been using cod liver oil for many years. I particularly like and trust the brand Nordic Naturals and I find this to be a good addition for getting extra Omega-fatty acids. I normally purchase the orange flavor which I find palatable. I usually take it followed by a swig of apple juice or any kind of natural juice that I may happen to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: We use this for our 3 year old autistic daughter
customer_reviews.text: This does have a slight smell. We mix 1\2 teaspoon with about 8 oz of Orange juice for our daughter. She drinks it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany%

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It truly beats swallowing pills. Take with a meal. I haven’t experienced anything negative.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Orange flavor is easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended that I take cod liver oil. This is a good quality oil with no fishy taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Frances

customer_reviews.title: easy to take..
customer_reviews.text: ..ordered the orange flavor and it is very easy to take. Instructions on bottle advise you to refrigerate it which makes it easier to swallow. No fishy taste for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roz S.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like orange- not fishy at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I’d say this : best tasting CL oil I’ve ever tasted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Barry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take/great taste
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this! She asks for more. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, and like the liquid form
customer_reviews.text: I add some to the top of my liquid vitamins each morning. Hard to review the benefits since it is subjective.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: BEST fish oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I take it every day and notice when I don’t. I have tried other fish oils (capsule form) and always come back to this! Definitely notice a difference in the quality and how you feel! We even give the infant version to our son and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use to keep the colds away for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for daily use to keep the colds away for school aged kids. Give it to my son every morning like my Grandma did for us as a child
customer_reviews.author: Claire T Taylor

customer_reviews.title: nice taste
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice taste, orange flavor. Not sure of the effects yet as we only took one teaspoon a day for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: ADD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product for humans and Pets (There is a Pet versión). Great way to add healthy omega 3.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant taste for cod liver oil.
customer_reviews.text: I just receive my oil so time will tell. The taste is just fine as advertised. Will let you know if my pain decreases in time. The order came on a timely fashion and no problems with the packing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually good to taste.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is unbelievably pleasant. Can't even tell that it's cod liver oil with should taste disgusting in most cases. There's no bad taste at all and I actually enjoy having my daily tsp. I would recommend this to anybody that is trying to start with omegas. I wouldn't do any other brand and definitely don't do the capsules. This is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A consistently quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my naturopath because of the omega 3's compared with other fish oils. I have been pleased. It is easy to use, does not have a fishy aftertaste, and keeps well in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins are natural
customer_reviews.text: Their process keeps the CLO close to natural and there is not synthetic vitamin A & D.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Ressler

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We put a few drops of this on our dogs food every morning and she loves it! Very good quality!

customer_reviews.title: broken packaging
customer_reviews.text: Just received the shipment today. The plastic cap is not broken, but loose, and paper wrapping is soaked with oil.

customer_reviews.title: No Bad Taste
customer_reviews.text: This cod liver oil did not taste bad at all.

customer_reviews.title: Natural sheen to the skin!
customer_reviews.text: Provides sheen on the skin in addition to its nutritional benefits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a replacement for one that my wife had previously bought. Unlike my childhood memories of cod liver oil, this one has no fishy taste and actually tastes good. I assume the Omega 3 oil is helping my health, though that's harder to judge.
customer_reviews.author: K. Luke

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is good fish oil. I don't even remember how many times I ordered this product, cos it's been years that I am using Nordic Naturals Cod liver Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Conchita Demus

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great oil. We use it to keep us focused and calm.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for sure
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for sure. I am stocking up on this for it does not go ran sit at all. It has a indefinite shelf life.

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal for Cod Liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: Tastes Good and its top notch quality. Fairly priced too for the amount you get.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is pretty good too
customer_reviews.text: My family and I appreciate this product for supporting our health. The taste is pretty good too!

customer_reviews.title: No vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: Does not make a big deal but This product contains Less than 2% daily Cod Liver oil is supposed to have vitamin D That’s why we bought it
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Jagger

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting Cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can easily take and swallow this cod liver oil. It is pure - only containing natural ingredients. The orange flavor is mild. I love it and love knowing I am improving my health!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lemoine

customer_reviews.title: Taste great for cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: I usual get this online because I have a hard time finding the big bottle a my health food store
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dudley

customer_reviews.title: I hate fish and the taste of fish always have
customer_reviews.text: I hate fish and the taste of fish always have, this removes that barrier and works really well and is made with high quality ingredients...
customer_reviews.author: HarveyC

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste!! Not find at all!! The orange is delicious! And smells like a creamsicle

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cod liver oil on the market bar none. Our family has been using this for years, and while I like the normal flavour, the kids like the orange one :-)
customer_reviews.author: Carlos O'Donell

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product. The taste is great
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. The taste is great. I have noticed my blood pressure decrease which is why I started using this product. The order arrived promptly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Connell

customer_reviews.title: So good for you
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Really beneficial. One of the best fish oil products out there. My doctor even switched to this after I told him about it. Wish it was a little cheaper however. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Part of our daily routine
customer_reviews.text: The taste is the best of all the cod liver oils we have tried. The product has become part of our daily routine along with medicines and supplements. We've been taking a dose every day for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sara k. Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. No taste. Highly recommend by my holistic practitioner. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vrabel

customer_reviews.title: Im giving it a go
customer_reviews.text: Ive built it in take DAILY JUST FOR A WEEK. I hope that over time it will decrease joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel R. Patay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. However the cap was broken in the package with some leakage but not enough to send back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars - great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - several family members have used this product for years and love it. I love that I don’t have burping and taste it for hours after.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality oil
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for couple of years now. My child likes it very much. Easy to swallow and flavor is nice too. Not sure of pain relief though.
customer_reviews.author: RAGHAVENDRA GUPTA K

customer_reviews.title: Better than taking straight Cod Liver Oil
customer_reviews.text: Better than taking straight Cod Liver Oil. Slight orange taste. If you have to take it, this is the best option I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to swallow and doesn't have a fishy taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Very Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this I’ve been off of cholesterol medicine for years
customer_reviews.author: David Kaiser

product_meta.title: Nordic Naturals Arctic CLO - Cod Liver Oil Promotes Heart and Brain Health, Supports Immune and Nervous Systems, Orange, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of1)
feature_bullets: Provides essential support for the heart brain and immune and nervous systems 100% natural orange essence provides a light clean flavor Our Gold Standard ensures exceptional freshness for optimal utilization and no fishy smell taste or aftertaste
